body_html:
@rana-alshaikh : Not entirely sure what you mean, but yes, it is possible to place individual operations on specific devices. For details see https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/using_gpu#manual_device_placement

If you're running into trouble, I'd suggest posting on StackOverflow.

body:
@rana-alshaikh : Not entirely sure what you mean, but yes, it is possible to place individual operations on specific devices. For details see https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/using_gpu#manual_device_placement

If you're running into trouble, I'd suggest posting on  [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow).
